level.heading: Rulemaking authority.
level.text: The Mayor shall promulgate rules in accordance with Chapter 5 of Title 2, to carry out the purposes of this chapter. The rules shall be promulgated within 90 days of May 7, 2002.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 401 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 14-132, see notes following ยง 26-1151.01.
